aboutpara: My name is Jainish Pandya, and I am currently in my final year of pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Engineering with a specialization in Information Technology at SVIT-Vasad. As a passionate Android developer, I have dedicated significant time to honing my skills in mobile application development, constantly seeking innovative ways to enhance user experiences. Alongside my development work, I am also deeply interested in UI/UX design, striving to create intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that meet users' needs and expectations. My educational journey and practical experiences have equipped me with a strong foundation in both technical and creative aspects, preparing me to contribute effectively to the dynamic field of technology.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application

education.universityName: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Institute of Technology - SVIT VASAD (GTU)
education.universityPara: Persuing my bachelor of Engineering in information technology, in which learned the core concepts of Computer Science.
Completed my diploma in Computer engineering with CGPA of 8.99. in which I have learned basics and intermediate concepts of Computer Science and related fields
